data.title: DWR Completes Installation of Emergency Salinity Drought Barrier
data.excerpt: After three weeks of round-the-clock work, the emergency drought salinity barrier (EDSB) was completed in late June.
data.author: Admin

site_settings.site_description: Learn more about current conditions, the stateâ€™s response and informational resources available to the public.
